# cheesefactory-postgres

-----------------

#### A simple PostgreSQL wrapper for psycopg2.

[![PyPI status](https://img.shields.io/pypi/status/cheesefactory-postgres.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/cheesefactory-postgres/)
